bft.views¶

bft.views.display_about(request, use_flash=True)¶

View that displays about page.

Return :render_to_response
bft.views.display_index(request, use_flash=True)¶

View that displays main page.

Return :render_to_response
bft.views.get_file(request, file_slug=None, file_name=None)¶

Sends a file to the borwser for download.

Return :HttpResponse
bft.views.html_progress(request)¶

Function that is used by the ‘no flash’ version. jQuery uses this via ajax to poll the progress at a set interval.

Return :JsonResponse with information about the progress of an upload.
bft.views.list_files(request, submission_slug=None, use_flash=True)¶

Outputs all the files for a submission.

Return :render_to_response
bft.views.login(request)¶

USU Specific

Processes login for USU credential by setting a session token ‘bft_auth’ in the session scope.

Return :Void
bft.views.process_recipients(submission, files)¶

Helper function that processes recipients and emails them a link to the file(s)

Return :Void
bft.views.process_sender(submission, files, has_email=False)¶

Helper function that processes sender and emails them with a link(s) to their files

Return :Void
bft.views.process_submission(*args, **kwargs)¶

Processes the submission and returns back to the browser.

Return :HttpResponse
bft.views.render_vars(request, use_flash=True)¶

Renders settings into a javascript file that can be read by the browser.

Return :render_to_response
bft.views.send_feedback(request)¶

Processes submission from feedback forms and emails Django admins.

Return :HttpResponse of 0 or 1
bft.views.submit_captcha(request)¶

Function that calls reCaptcha’s webservice to determine if correct or not.

Return :HttpResponse of 0 or 1
bft.views.upload_flash(request)¶

Helper function that processes the file upload. Used by flash player.

Return :HttpResponse of 0 or 1
bft.views.upload_html(request, submission)¶

Helper function that processes the file upload. Used by the ‘no flash’ version.

Return :Void
bft.views.use_captcha(request)¶

Function to check whether or not to use reCaptcha.

Return :True or False
